cons: If you don't like small places, it's not for you.

job_title: Athletics Facilities and Event Coordinator in Hamburg, NY
pros: The People here are really great
cons: Higher ups have no care for the people below them

review_title: Lack of Synergy and a lack of communication
pros: Very rewarding work, building with great students
cons: Lack of leadership and clear expectations

job_title: Director of Career Development in Hamburg, NY
pros: Hilbert College has some of the best professional staff in the higher education industry. The faculty and staff live the mission of the institution and truly care for each student as individuals.
cons: Being a small, private institution the pay scale is very low unless you are willing to teach additional courses, take on multiple roles, etc.

job_title: Adjunct Professor in Orchard Park, NY
pros: The energy and enthusiasm from my students inspires me to always give them my best and to be open to learn from them, too.
cons: The administration gets stuck in tradition and is less open to innovation than I would expect.
